s0247.literal: Appraisal says: My maternal grandfather's brothers served as attendants to Emperor Yuan; they told me Emperor Yuan had many talents and skills, was good at calligraphy.
s0247.idiomatic: Appraisal: My maternal grandfather's brothers served as attendants to Emperor Yuan; they told me Emperor Yuan had many talents and skills, excelling at calligraphy.

s0248.literal: He drummed zithers and se, blew vertical flutes, composed his own tunes, clothed them in song voices, divided and marked the rhythms, exhausting the minute and subtle.
s0248.idiomatic: He played zithers and se, blew vertical flutes, composed his own melodies, set them to vocal music, divided and marked the rhythms, exhausting all subtlety and nuance.

s0249.literal: Young and fond of Confucianism, and when he ascended the throne, he summoned and employed Confucian scholars, entrusted them with governance; Gong, Xue, Wei, Kuang alternated as prime ministers.
s0249.idiomatic: From youth he loved Confucianism, and upon ascending the throne, he summoned and employed Confucian scholars, entrusting them with governance. Gong, Xue, Wei, and Kuang alternated as prime ministers.
